description: This Java class defines a HeartbeatRequest object used to send heartbeat signals within a mock Zigbee core request framework. It extends the Request class, encapsulating request initialization and execution logic to send a heartbeat response.

classes.name: HeartbeatRequest
classes.description: A request object representing a heartbeat signal, used to check connectivity or keep-alive status within the testing framework.

methods.name: HeartbeatRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing the request with a unique request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the heartbeat action by sending a Response with specific parameters.
